Name: Harry Potter
Description: The main protagonist of the series a young wizard who survived an attack by the dark wizard Voldemort as a baby.

Name: Hermoine Granger
Description: One of Harry's best friends and a top student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

Name: Ron Weasley
Description: Another of Harry's best friends a loyal and humorous wizard from a large family.

Name: Ginevra Weasley
Description: The youngest of the Weasley siblings and Ron's younger sister known as Ginny.

Name: Neville Longbottom
Description: A shy and initially clumsy student at Hogwarts who becomes a courageous hero.

Name: Luna Lovegood
Description: A quirky and kind-hearted student known for her belief in magical creatures and conspiracy theories.

Name: Tom Riddle
Description: The young Voldemort before he became the Dark Lord a student at Hogwarts known for his charisma and dark tendencies.

Name: Draco Malfoy
Description: A student from a wealthy and prejudiced family initially Harry's rival at Hogwarts.

Name: Severus Snape
Description: The complex and enigmatic Potions Master at Hogwarts with a mysterious past.

Name: Bellatrix Lestrange
Description: A fanatical and sadistic follower of Voldemort known for her cruelty.

Name: Nymphadora Tonks
Description: A cheerful and talented young witch who can change her appearance at will.

Name: Albus Dumbledore
Description: The wise and powerful headmaster of Hogwarts and mentor to Harry.

Name: Albus Potter
Description: Harry's son a student at Hogwarts and one of the main characters in the epilogue.

Name: Salazar Slytherin
Description: Salazar Slytherin, a Hogwarts founder, esteemed cunningness and ambition, shaping the values of Slytherin House.

Name: Rubeus Hagrid
Description: The gentle giant groundskeeper at Hogwarts who cares for magical creatures.

Name: Dobby
Description: A free elf who initially serves the Malfoy family and later becomes a friend of Harry.

Name: Alastor Moody
Description: An experienced Auror and Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.

Name: Sirius Black
Description: Harry's godfather and a member of the Order of the Phoenix wrongly imprisoned for a crime he didn't commit.

Name: Remus Lupin
Description: A kind and knowledgeable werewolf who is one of Harry's mentors.

Name: Minerva McGonagall
Description: The stern but fair Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts and head of Gryffindor house.

Name: Fred Weasley
Description: One of the mischievous Weasley twins known for their pranks and humor.

Name: George Weasley
Description: The other half of the Weasley twin duo also known for their joke shop.

Name: Lucius Malfoy
Description: Draco's father and a prominent Death Eater supporter.

Name: Cedric Diggory
Description: A talented and fair-minded student from Hogwarts who tragically died in the Triwizard Tournament.

Name: Godric Gryffindor
Description: Godric Gryffindor, a Hogwarts founder, was known for his bravery and chivalry, and these qualities define Gryffindor House.

Name: Helga Hufflepuff
Description: Helga Hufflepuff, one of Hogwarts' founders, valued hard work, loyalty, and fair play, which are the hallmarks of Hufflepuff House.

Name: Rowena Ravenclaw
Description: Rowena Ravenclaw, a Hogwarts founder, prized intelligence and wisdom, embodying the ideals of Ravenclaw House.

Name: Ronan
Description: Known for his wisdom and affiliation with the Forbidden Forest.

Name: Narcissa Malfoy
Description: Has unwavering devotion to her family, particularly her son Draco, and her affiliation with the Death Eaters.

Name: Myrtle Warren
Description: Commonly known as Moaning Myrtle, is a Hogwarts ghost who haunts the girls' bathroom and is known for her wailing and melancholic demeanor

Name: Dudley Dursley
Description: Harry Potter's spoiled and often cruel cousin, known for his gluttony and initial hostility towards Harry.

Name: James Potter I
Description: Was also known as Prongs, was one of Harry Potter's parents, and a skilled wizard who played a significant role in the First and Second Wizarding Wars.

Name: Blaise Zabini
Description: Known for his aloof demeanor and affiliation with Draco Malfoy's group.

Name: Barty Crouch Jr
Description: Barty Crouch Jr. is a cunning and loyal Death Eater who was imprisoned in Azkaban but escaped, serving Lord Voldemort's dark agenda.

Name: Aurelius Dumbledore
Description: Not too much known. Also known as Credence Barebone. A character whose existence and true identity are subject to debate and mystery.

Name: Padma Patil
Description: A twin

Name: Parvati Patil
Description: A twin

Name: Pomona Sprout
Description: Professor of Herbology at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry and the head of Hufflepuff House, known for her expertise in magical plants and her dedication to her students.

Name: Gellert Grindelwald
Description: A dark wizard who sought to establish a new order in the wizarding world, advocating for the superiority of wizards over Muggles.

Name: Nagini
Description: Nagini was aMaledictuswho became a huge, magical, diamond-patterned snake and a companion to Voldemort.

Name: Molly Weasley
Description: Molly Weasley is a loving and fiercely protective mother of seven children,known for her warm-hearted nature and her willingness to stand up against dark forces to protect her family.

Name: Ariana Dumbledore
Description: A young witch who suffered a traumatic event in her childhood that left her emotionally scarred and unable to control her magic.

Name: Petunia Evans Dursley
Description: Harry's aunt, who raised Harry.

Name: Lily Potter
Description: Lily Potter is Harry Potter's mother, known for her sacrificial love and her protection of Harry from Lord Voldemort's deadly curse.

Name: Newt Scamander
Description: A renowned Magizoologist and the author of "Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them," known for his deep affinity for magical creatures and his adventures in the wizarding world.

Name: Dominique Weasley
Description: Dominique Weasley is the middle child of Bill & Fleur Weasley

Name: Arthur Weasley
Description: Kind-hearted and inquisitive wizard known for his fascination with Muggle inventions

Name: Cho Chang
Description: Cho Chang is known for her Quidditch skills as a Seeker for the Ravenclaw team and for her brief romantic involvement with Harry Potter.

Name: James Potter II
Description: The eldest child and first son of Harry and Ginevra Potter

Name: Viktor Krum
Description: A highly skilled Quidditch player and a Seeker for the Bulgarian national Quidditch team.

Name: Cormac McLaggen
Description: Known for his overconfident and sometimes arrogant personality.

Name: Pansy Parkinson
Description: Portrayed as snobbish, prejudiced, and often cruel towards students from other houses, particularly Gryffindor.

Name: Edward Lupin
Description: The only child and son of the lateRemus LupinandNymphadora Tonks. He was, like his mother, aMetamorphmagus, but did not inherit his father'slycanthropy

Name: Rita Skeeter
Description: A reporter for theDaily Prophetwho is known for her rubbishy exposs of well-known wizards.

Name: Lavender Brown
Description: Particularly fond of Divination, plays a minor role in the Battle of Hogwarts.

Name: Olympe Maxime
Description: The headmistress of Beauxbatons Academy of Magic and her impressive stature as a half-giantess. She is a dignified and elegant witch who represents her school at the Triwizard Tournament
